data.Name: Horizon GreenTech Ventures
data.Tagline: A seed to early stage technological accelerator focused on disruptive technologies addressing the Green & Smart Energy and mobility domains.
data.About:
A seed to early stage technological accelerator focused on leveraging scientific, technological, industrial and business expertise to nurture & grow disruptive technologies addressing the Green & Smart Energy and mobility domains.

At Horizon GreenTech Ventures we accelerate the successful development of entrepreneurial companies, providing funding, technological and business support, industrial orientation and unique services.
